#summary URLs for OpenNI and other prerequisitive downloads
#labels Featured

@en Below is the list of the URLs to download the OpenNI and other prerequisitive modules that I tested.

@ja 現在動作確認できているOpenNI以下のモジュールのダウンロードURLです。

  * OpenNI stable v1.3.2.1: http://www.openni.org/downloadfiles/opennimodules/openni-binaries/stable/132-openni-stable-build-for-windows-x86-32-bit-v1-3-2/download
  * NITE stable v1.4.0.5:http://www.openni.org/downloadfiles/opennimodules/openni-compliant-middleware-binaries/stable/146-primesense-nite-stable-build-for-windows-x86-32-bit-v1-4-0/download
  * SensorKinect driver for stable OpenNI 5.0.3.3: https://github.com/avin2/SensorKinect/blob/master/Bin/SensorKinect-Win-OpenSource32-5.0.3.3.msi?raw=true

@en The module's provider may change the URLs and the links may become invalid. In case it happened, let me know or look for the files from the sites below by yourself.

@ja モジュール提供元がURLを変え、リンクが無効になってしまう場合があります。このような場合にはお知らせいただくか、または下記のサイトからファイルを自力で検索してください。。

  * OpenNI: http://www.openni.org/downloadfiles/opennimodules/2-openni-binaries
  * NITE: http://www.openni.org/downloadfiles/opennimodules/12-openni-compliant-middleware-binaries
  * SensorKinect: https://github.com/avin2/SensorKinect
